activities: Stone Blade collects certain data from its customers on a voluntary basis, including their email address, name, phone number, and billing address in order to process payment information.  Customers may opt out of any information collection, and Stone Blade uses the information only to the extent necessary to process orders for customers. Stone Blade does not collect sensitive information or share personal information with third parties without the user's consent.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
